mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xiangmu_id as xiangmuId ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.yanshou_gongyi_name as yanshouGongyiName ,a.yanshou_gongyi_buwei as yanshouGongyiBuwei ,a.yanshou_gongyi_biaozhun as yanshouGongyiBiaozhun ,a.yanshou_gongyi_shijishiyong as yanshouGongyiShijishiyong ,a.jianzaojindu_file as jianzaojinduFile ,a.hege_types as hegeTypes ,a.yanshou_time as yanshouTime ,a.yanshou_gongyi_content as yanshouGongyiContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
